name: Path lines
description:
A short puzzlescript game about blocks that beam out pathlines which are the only thing the player can walk on.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=b1c07b54e2091c40221cf48fe66d25ab

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=b1c07b54e2091c40221cf48fe66d25ab
